name: Intercom
channels: Web chat, in-app messaging, email, SMS, social (add-ons)
aiCapabilities: Fin AI Agent – NLP-based, $0.99 per resolution, real-time translation, human handoff
integrations: Salesforce, Zendesk, HubSpot, API, app ecosystem

name: Tidio
pricingModel: Tiered by usage (Starter ~$29/mo, Growth ~$59/mo, Plus custom)
freeTrialOrTier: Free tier includes limited live chat and AI; 7-day trial on paid plans
channels: Web chat, email, Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger
aiCapabilities: Lyro AI chatbot, GPT-4 powered AI assistant, templates, handles up to ~70% inquiries
builderUX: Drag-and-drop visual flow builder, templated bots
analytics: Live visitor tracking, analytics, canned responses

name: ChatBot.com
pricingModel: Fixed monthly tiers ($52–$424/mo) plus per-chat overage
channels: Web chat, Messenger, widget across multiple websites
aiCapabilities: AI Assist, custom AI models, chatbot training
integrations: Shopify, Facebook Messenger, LiveChat, Zapier, API
builderUX: Visual builder, templates, rich messages, advanced workflows
